channel.title: Adding world objects
channel.description: I want to add a world object and i have a worldobjects.cfg, and I type in the coords, objectid, the way its faceing, and I tried a billion different orients, but none make it appear on my terrain..... Here's what I typed in.... [code]//-------posX---posY-----ID----face----type---Height-----Description object = 1114 3252 3438 -3 10 0 Throne [EOF][/code] Won't work any suggestions?

item.description:

item.title: Adding world objects
item.dc:creator: @yppman yppman
item.description:
@yppman wrote:

I want to add a world object and i have a worldobjects.cfg,
and I type in the coords, objectid, the way its faceing, and
I tried a billion different orients, but none make it appear on
my terrain… Here’s what I typed in…

//-------posX---posY-----ID----face----type---Height-----Description object = 1114 3252 3438 -3 10 0 Throne [EOF]
Won’t work any suggestions?

Read full topic
